modName: The Imperial Legion_Dual Sheath Redux Patch
summary: This mod is a patch for The Imperial Legion by johnskyrim and Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a patch for The Imperial Legion by johnskyrim and Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen.
Both mods are required and can be used with Imperial Legion - Imperial Shield Replacer by johnskyrim and XMen19, Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea and Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles.

Required Mods (Before Installation):
Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen and Mods required by this mod e.g. XPMS skeleton
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?

The Imperial Legion by johnskyrim
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40604/?

Optional Mods (can be installed before or after):
Imperial Legion - Imperial Shield Replacer by johnskyrim and XMen19
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45329/?

Winter Is Coming - Cloaks by Nivea
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13486/?

Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/?

Installation:
Add .rar to NMM and activate. Then run your chosen patcher for Dual Sheath Redux e.g. SUM.

Check out my YouTube page for more on Skyrim and Mods
www.youtube.com/user/Nozi87

Credits
johnskyrim for The Imperial Legion
johnskyrim and XMen19 for Imperial Legion - Imperial Shield Replacer
Neovalen for Dual Sheath Redux
author: izon87604
